member.summary: Update the rectangles location by a touch event

The end point of the touch
The index of the rectangle when the shape is to be updated.

member.name: P:Emgu.CV.UI.GLView.GLImageView.Rectangles
member.summary: The rectangles to be drawed. (0,0) point should be the image texture origin where (1,1) should match the opposite corner of the image.
